    • Uses of TopRewriter in com.sri.ai.grinder.api

      Methods in com.sri.ai.grinder.api that return TopRewriter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TopRewriter Theory.getTopRewriter()
      Returns a TopRewriter performing the same simplification as Theory.simplify(Expression, Context), but only on the top expression (that is, without recursing to sub-expressions).

      A TopRewriter solving quantified expressions, given the syntactic form type, group, and MultiQuantifierEliminator.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LazySampledFunctionApplicationTopRewriter
      A TopRewriter that rewrites an expression to its value if it is a LazySampledFunction application, or delegates its rewriting to a given base TopRewriter otherwise.

      LazySampledFunctionApplicationTopRewriter(Rewriter argumentsEvaluator, TopRewriter baseTopRewriter)
      Constructor receives a Rewriter that evaluates the arguments of LazySampledFunction applications, and uses it to evaluate such applications.

      A Switch rewriter replacing symbols by their bound value from context, if any.

      Specializes CommutativeAssociative to situations in which all arguments are constants, reducing the whole expression to a constant itself.

    • Uses of TopRewriter in com.sri.ai.grinder.library.commonrewriters

      Classes in com.sri.ai.grinder.library.commonrewriters that implement TopRewriter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CommonSimplifier
      A TopRewriter aggregating: BindingTopSimplifier: replaces symbols by their values(=, !=) BooleanSimplifier: boolean connectives (and, or, not, <=>, =>) and if then else NumericSimplifier: arithmetic (+, -, *, /) and inequalities (<, <=, >=, >) EqualitySimplifier: equality and disequality (=, !=) InequalitySimplifier: inequality (<, <=, >, >=) CardinalityOfSetConstantSimplifier: cardinalities (must be registered in context's global objects as a function application of | .
      class  CommonSimplifiersAndSymbolicQuantifierEliminationRewritersTopRewriter
      A TopRewriter aggregating: CommonSimplifier SymbolicQuantifierEliminatorRewritersTopRewriter.
      class  SymbolicQuantifierEliminatorRewritersTopRewriter
      A TopRewriter aggregating symbolic quantifier eliminators for +, *, max, cardinality, for all and there exists using DefaultMultiQuantifierEliminator (SGVET for summations).

      class  IfThenElseConstantBranchesSimplifier
      Simplifies if C then true else D ---> C or D if C then false else D ---> not C and D if C then D else true ---> not C or D if C then D else false ---> C and D
      class  PrettySimplifier
      A TopRewriter simplified normalized expressions to more readable ones by combining: IfThenElseConstantBranchesSimplifier PolynomialSimplifier

      class  IntensionalUnionIntersectionEqualToEmptySetSimplifier
      (∪i ∈ D:CΦ) ∩ (∪i' ∈ D':C'Φ') = ∅ → ∀ i ∈ D : C ⇒ ∀ i' ∈ D' : C' ⇒ (Φ ∩ Φ' = ∅)

      class  IntensionalUnionToUnionsOfIntensionalSetsOfBaseTypeTopRewriter 
      class  IntersectionEmptySetSimplifier
      {} intersection Set ---> {}

      class  IntersectionExtensionalSetSimplifier

      class  IntersectionExtensionalSetTopRewriter 
      class  IntersectionIntensionalSetsSimplifier
      {{ (on I1) H1 : C1 }} intersection {{ (on I2) H2 : C2 }} ---> {{ (on I1) H1 : C1 and evaluate(there exists I2 : C2 and H2 = H1) }}
      class  IntersectionIntensionalSetsTopRewriter

      class  SetExpressionIsEqualToEmptySetTopRewriter 
      class  SetIntersectExtensionalSetEqualToEmptySetSimplifier

      class  SetIntersectExtensionalSetEqualToEmptySetTopRewriter

    • Uses of TopRewriter in com.sri.ai.grinder.rewriter.api

      Subinterfaces of TopRewriter in com.sri.ai.grinder.rewriter.api 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Simplifier
      A Simplifier knows just enough about the symbols in a language to simplify it in a shallow way, that is, to replace function applications by a simpler equivalent expression, if that expression is determined by their immediate arguments.
      Methods in com.sri.ai.grinder.rewriter.api that return TopRewriter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> TopRewriter TopRewriter.makeTopRewriterFromAlreadyMergedSwitches(java.util.List<Switch<T>> mergedSwitches) 
      static <T> TopRewriter TopRewriter.makeTopRewriterFromTopRewritersThatAreEitherFirstOfOrSwitches(java.util.List<? extends TopRewriter> topRewritersThatAreEitherFirstOfOrSwitches)
      Takes a list of TopRewriters, then determines a list of Switch rewriters, each of them the merge of all Switch rewriters with the same key maker (from Switch.merge(List).

      Varargs version of makeTopRewriterFromTopRewritersThatAreEitherFirstOfOrSwitches(List).

    • Uses of TopRewriter in com.sri.ai.grinder.rewriter.core

      Classes in com.sri.ai.grinder.rewriter.core that implement TopRewriter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CombiningTopRewriter
      An extension of FirstOf that consolidates a list of TopRewriters that are either switches or first of top rewriters, by merging Switch rewriters based on the same key maker, and flattening TopRewriters of switches.
      class  FirstOf
      Applies a list of base rewriters until one of them modifies the original expression, returning this as the overall result.
      class  IfEquals<T>
      A Switch extension that compares a key maker's result to a predefined value and executes a given base rewriter if they are equal and returns the same expression otherwise.
      class  IfRewriter
      A TopRewriter that executes one of two base top rewriters based on a predicate.
      class  Switch<T>
      A rewriter that stores a map from keys in some type to base Rewriters and a key maker function to Expressions to the key type.
      Constructors in com.sri.ai.grinder.rewriter.core with parameters of type TopRewriter 
      Constructor and Description
      CombiningTopRewriter(java.lang.String name, TopRewriter... topRewritersThatAreEitherFirstOfOrSwitches)
      Creates a FirstOf rewriter containing Switch rewriters merging all Switch rewriters embedded in input top rewriters.
      CombiningTopRewriter(TopRewriter... topRewriters)
